titles: Orders taken the x. day of October in the thirde yere of the raigne of our Soueraigne Ladye, Elizabeth Quene of Englande, Fraunce and Irelande, defender of the fayth. [and]c. By vertue of her Maiesties letters addressed to her hyghnesse Commissioners for causes ecclesiasticall as foloweth.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publisher: In Powles Church yarde by Richarde Iugge, printer to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
